original_text: “But when you see Jerusalem surrounded by armies, then know that its desolation has come near.
korean_text: 너희가 예루살렘이 군대들에게 에워싸이는 것을 보거든 그 멸망이 가까운 줄을 알라

sentences.original_text: But when you see Jerusalem surrounded by armies
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희가 예루살렘이 군대들에게 에워싸인 것을 볼 때

sentences.original_text: that its desolation has come near
